p: Freshly collected leaves were air-dried at room temperature in the laboratory. Dried leaves were pulverized and cold maceration method was employed for the extraction [ 21]. Briefly, approximately 1200 g of the powdered leaf of M. oleifera was soaked in 3 L of absolute ethanol for 72 h thereafter the content was filtered into a conical flask. Filtrates was concentrated using rotatory evaporator at 40 °C.
